table.name: vtiger_bhsmissedcalls
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsmissedcalls` ( `bhsmissedcallsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsmissedcalls_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsmissedcallsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsmissedcallscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsmissedcallscf` ( `bhsmissedcallsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsmissedcallsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
